dialogue: Spirit and Tequia walk to the outside of the Throne Room.
I greet your majesty, Empress Saki, the one true ruler of the Empire.
I see you've gotten youself a new pilot, Tequia.
She looks familiar. What's your name girlie?
My name is Spirit, your grace.
Ah, yes. You've been winning those little racing circuits, galaxy.
Quite the jump in scale, no? What made you join us?
...I needed money to pay for my father's medical treatment.
Ms. Tequia happened to offer me this job at the time.
My, what a filial daughter! You're quite the admirable one, Spirit!
Now, onto the next matter. Tequia, I want your platoon to advance
to planet Prohibre and eliminate the Army forces stationed there.
